Klasse AddJobPostView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
com.spirit.application.views.profil.Unternehmen.AddJobPostView
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, Serializable
@Route(value="unternehmen/jobpost", layout=AppView.class) @RolesAllowed("unternehmen") public class AddJobPostView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
View for adding a new job post. This page is accessible only to users with the "UNTERNEHMEN" role.

The view provides a form where users can enter details about a job posting, including title, employment type, location, and description. The form also includes validation for required fields and options to save or reset the input fields.

On successful submission, the job post is saved to the database and the user is redirected to their job postings page.

    • AddJobPostView

      @Autowired public AddJobPostView(EntityFactory entityFactory, SessionService sessionService, JobPostService jobPostService, MarkdownConverter markdownConverter)
      Constructs the AddJobPostView.
      Parameter:
      entityFactory - The factory for creating job post entities.
      sessionService - The session management service.
      jobPostService - The service for managing job posts.
      markdownConverter - The markdown converter (not currently used in this implementation).
